prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Chromatic Percussion, Brass, Bass, Drums, Piano, but without Reed.
captions:
Style 1:
This song features the sounds of Guitar, Chromatic Percussion, Brass, Bass, Drums, and Piano, but without Reed.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Guitar, Chromatic Percussion, Brass, Bass, Drums, and Piano, but Reed is absent.

Style 3:
This piece is played with Guitar, Chromatic Percussion, Brass, Bass, Drums, and Piano, but Reed is not included.
